name: Anna Holt
affiliation: Project PurityEnclave Research and Development Division(afterThe Waters of Life)

topics.response_text: I think you'd better leave now.

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for my father. Have you seen him?
topics.response_text: Look, some of us are trying to get work done here. There have been enough disruptions recently.
Of course! You've seen the kind of technology these people have. They want to help people. They want to change the Wasteland.

topics.topic_text: Get out of here while you can! They'll be here any second!
topics.response_text: Get out? Why on earth would I want to do that?

topics.topic_text: Wait a minute. What are you doing here?
topics.response_text: They... they captured me. Brought me here from Project Purity.
I'm Anna. Anna Holt. I used to work for Doctor Li.

topics.topic_text: How much did you tell them?
topics.response_text: Everything they needed to know to improve on the original design, and to make sure it's actually completed.

topics.topic_text: Do you know how to get out of here?
topics.response_text: I'm afraid I'm not able to help you with that.
They wanted information. About Doctor Li, about Project Purity. They want to know how to start it up, and why it wouldn't work.

topics.topic_text: Why would you abandon everything you worked for with Doctor Li?
topics.response_text: Look, it's not personal. Really, it's not. But Doctor Li... She's scraping by. She's scavenging for parts in the Wastes.

topics.topic_text: You've betrayed Doctor Li, and my father.
topics.response_text: I'm sorry you see it that way. What are you going to do, kill me over it?

topics.topic_text: What do you know about Zimmer?
topics.response_text: He's from up north. He was bragging about how great it is up there.

topics.topic: RCTopicDoctorLiWhat can you tell me about Doctor Li?
topics.topic_text: Is Doctor Li as smart as they say she is?
topics.response_text: She's certainly head and shoulders above most everyone else around here. Though that's not saying much.

topics.topic: RCTopicGetDrinksWhere can I get a stiff drink?
topics.topic_text: Can I get a drink around here? Preferably somewhere clean.
topics.response_text: The Weatherly Hotel is a good choice. It's on the upper deck.

conversation.response_text: Look, Doctor Zimmer, we’ve been over this. We don’t know about your runaway robot, and we don’t care. This lab is dedicated to solving real problems.{frustrated}
We've ALL already told you we're too busy to help. Now if you please, Mister Zimmer...{annoyed but trying to remain professional}
Insulting me won't get you what you want, "DOCTOR" Zimmer. Now, if you'll excuse me? PLEASE!{annoyed but trying to remain professional "doctor" said with contempt}
But I did, Doctor Li. I put it right where you told me to.

description:
Anna Holt is a 48 year-old Caucasian Female.

A dedicated botanist working at the Rivet City science lab under Doctor Madison Li. Anna is responsible for developing naturally occurring foodstuffs to support the growing population of the Capital Wasteland. She is known for her expertise in plant genetics and her somewhat irritable demeanor when visitors disrupt her work.

Anna Holt's Personality: Dedicated to her scientific work but easily annoyed by distractions. Impressed by advanced technology and innovation. Pragmatic and willing to adapt to new circumstances.

Anna Holt's Backstory: Anna Holt has spent most of her adult life studying botany in the post-war world. Before joining Project Purity, she worked in various agricultural projects throughout the Capital Wasteland, helping settlements develop sustainable food sources. Her expertise in plant genetics made her an invaluable addition to Doctor Madison Li's team at Rivet City. Despite her somewhat prickly personality, her colleagues respect her knowledge and dedication to improving life in the wasteland.
